src:
Brexit försenar chefsbyte på Bank of England
Medan ECB precis har installerat Christine Lagarde som ny chef får Bank of England vänta på efterträdaren till Mark Carney som slutar om tre månader. Beslut tas först efter nyvalet den 12 december. En kvinna uppges vara den nuvarande regeringens favorit.
01 Nov 2019, 11:06 by Mikael Björk

text:
Brexit delays change of boss at Bank of England
While the ECB has just installed Christine Lagarde as the new head, the Bank of England will have to wait for Mark Carney to retire in three months. The decision will only be made after the new election on December 12. A woman is said to be the favorite of the current government.
01 Nov 2019, 11:06 by Mikael Björk
